text: A witch trial is a legal proceeding that is part of a witch-hunt. Witch trial may also refer to: * Salem witch trials, a series of hearings and prosecutions of people accused of witchcraft in colonial Massachusetts between February 1692 and May 1693 * "Witch Trial" (Charmed), an episode from Charmed season two * The Witch Trials, an electropunk musical group (1980–1981) ==See also== *Witch hunt (disambiguation) *Witch hunter (disambiguation) *Witchfinder General (disambiguation) *:Category:Witch trials
title: Witch trial (disambiguation)
